main.name: Dominic
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React, NodeJs , MongoDB and Google Cloud
main.bio: Hi there! I am Dommy! You might also know me as PAPA Savannaspace. I've been coding for over 10 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping them excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming fortune 500 Companies. With this passion, I have now trained thousand's of entreprenuers across the globe. Through live coaching sessions , I have accumulated several skilss  demonstrating how to apply developer and entreprenuership skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help startups and entreprenuers enter the world of Making the world a better place by making better things. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world at Savannaspace.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the Savannaspace fam!

education.school: Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology - Kenya
education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Mathematics and Computer Science

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Designing, Developing and integrating AI to all the apps while Implementing State of the art Cloud deployment  On the way to charge tech landscape in Africa! Building the Savannaspace Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Dominic is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Dominic has been AWESOME, he makes making awesome products so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
